title: Did I say "happy" in Chick-Fil-A-A-Assa"?
subtitle: For years, Ticktock videos and tweeting claimed that "happiness" in Chick-Phil-a earned customers a discount, free ice cream, or free food.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: If a customer says "happy" to a Chickville employee, they have the right to a discount,
